meaningMnemonic: When the <kanji>sun</kanji> <kanji>burn</kanji>s something, and that something is you, it's giving you <vocabulary>sunburn</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings here are the vocab kun'yomi readings. You have ひ for 日 and や for 焼け (which you learned with the vocab). Combine it with some sunscreen and hopefully you'll prevent the <vocabulary>sunburn</vocabulary>.
